yuddha hamudawen 1/3 ka pirisak jathiya godanangime mehewarehi niratha wiya haki athara uparima ayurin siwil paripalanayata sahayogaya labadiya yuthu bawata wu yuddha hamudadhipathithumage sankalpayata samagamiwa ‘pibidemu polonnaruwa’ wyapruthiye adhyaksha mejar jenaral sudantha ranasinha (wishramika) ge mangapenawima yatathe nagenahira aarakshaka sena aagnyapathi mejar jenaral santhusitha pananwalage upades paridi yuddha hamuda samajikayin saha yuddha hamuda yanthropakarana yodaganimin mema wawehi aluthwadiya katayuthu sikurada (02) dina aarambha karana ladi.
